item.description: Slackware 15.1 on the Teacup # Introduction # One of our community members uncovered a version of Slackware that works on the T31 Its very easy to get up and running on the Teacup RevA board. However it is not maintained any longer This is written as fast as possable, your YMMV Download Image # Download: https://www.hackerhomestead.com/files/teacup/slackware-mips/slack.tar.gz MD5 Sum 7012210f843bf289cb48d9428c7cb4bd slack.tar.gz Install # Create 2 partitions on your SD card and format them.
